about_the_game:
Overboost is an Indie Game Developed by a Solo Developer

Players will primarily use various skills for cooperation or competition. The game continuously introduces both common and uncommon game modes, aiming to create new variations and experiences.

Game Modes Currently in Development:

  • Super Parkour
  • Infinite Zombies

Planned Game Modes:

  • Intense Combat
  • Payload Mode

About the Developer

The developer, after years of MOD development, began to seek greater creative freedom. To fully realize their ideas, they started learning Unreal Engine development. This is the developer's first game, and they intend to incorporate some unconventional gameplay elements that differ from traditional games, hoping to bring a fresh experience for both themselves and the players.

The game is still in its early development stages, and the developer is eager to engage with future players. New game modes and skills will be continuously added, making the game increasingly rich in content.

name: Overboost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.3 Ghz to 3.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: This is a shooting game unlike the conventional ones, where your primary means of attack is no longer various firearms, but a wide array of diverse skills. You achieve victory by combining them effectively.
